forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. Southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon in Downtown San Francisco welcomes a gentle embrace of sunshine, with the air crisp and invigorating. A high near 66 degrees gracefully settles in, only to dip slightly as the day rolls into its later hours, creating a comfortable environment for leisurely strolls or café visits. The west-southwest winds, dancing between 8 and 14 mph with playful gusts, offer a refreshing touch, enhanced by the clear skies revealing a striking view toward the Golden Gate Bridge and the bustling heart of the city. 

As twilight beckons, the warmth of the day will give way to a comfortable evening, settling around 53 degrees under mostly clear skies. With such pleasant weather, one might effortlessly slip into a light sweater if venturing outside. Tonight holds promise for peaceful gatherings under the stars, perhaps at a local park or dinner by the waterfront, as the gentle breeze invites relaxation and conversation. The absence of fog allows the city’s vibrant colors to shine through, providing an inviting backdrop for any activity.
